movies.title: The Most Terrible Time in My Life
movies.plot: Maiku Hama is a private detective working in Yokohama. Hama comes to the aid of a Taiwanese waiter named Yang and agrees to track down his missing brother. Through a series of double-crosses Hama gets embroiled in a gang war and a revenge plot between the two brothers.
movies.simplePlot: Maiku Hama is a private detective working in Yokohama. Hama comes to the aid of a Taiwanese waiter named Yang and agrees to track down his missing brother. Through a series of ...

biography.bio: Masatoshi Nagase was born on July 15, 1966 in Miyazaki, Japan. He is an actor, known for Mystery Train (1989), La servante et le samouraï (2004) and Suicide Club (2001). He was previously married to Kyôko Koizumi.
biography.name: Masatoshi Nagase

biography.bio: Shirô Sano was born on March 4, 1955 in Shimane, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Violent Cop (1989), Godzilla 2000 (1999) and Le soleil (2005).
biography.name: Shirô Sano

biography.bio: Kiyotaka Nanbara was born on February 13, 1965 in Kagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Hirunandesu! (2011), Ucchan Nanchan no Honô no Challenger (1995) and Shichi-nin no otaku: cult seven (1992).
biography.name: Kiyotaka Nanbara

biography.bio: Yang Haitin is an actor, known for The Most Terrible Time in My Life (1993).
biography.name: Yang Haitin

biography.bio: Te-Chien Hou is an actor and composer, known for The Most Terrible Time in My Life (1993), Une belle journée d'été (1991) and Good Men, Good Women (1995).
biography.name: Te-Chien Hou

biography.bio: Akaji Maro was born in 1943 in Ishikawa, Japan. He is known for his work on Kill Bill: Vol. 2 (2004), Kill Bill: Vol. 1 (2003) and Kikujiro (1999).
biography.name: Akaji Maro

biography.bio: Shin'ya Tsukamoto was born on January 1, 1960 in Shibuya, Tokyo, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for Tetsuo, the Iron Man (1989), Tokyo Fist (1995) and A Snake of June (2002).
biography.name: Shin'ya Tsukamoto

biography.bio: Jô Shishido was born on December 6, 1933 in Osaka, Japan. He is an actor, known for Branded to Kill (1967), La barrière de chair (1964) and Youth of the Beast (1963).
biography.name: Jô Shishido

biography.bio: Haruko Wanibuchi was born on April 22, 1945 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for One Missed Call 2 (2005), House (1977) and The Stairway to the Distant Past (1995).
biography.name: Haruko Wanibuchi

biography.bio: Kaho Minami was born on January 20, 1964 in Hyogo, Japan. She is an actress and producer, known for Angel Dust (1994), The Geisha House (1998) and Tomorrow (1988). She has been married to Ken Watanabe since December 3, 2005. She was previously married to Jinsei Tsuji.
biography.name: Kaho Minami

biography.bio: Mika Ohmine is an actress, known for The Stairway to the Distant Past (1995) and The Most Terrible Time in My Life (1993).
biography.name: Mika Ohmine

biography.bio: Housei Kondo is an actor, known for The Most Terrible Time in My Life (1993).
biography.name: Housei Kondo

biography.bio: Masako Miyaji is an actress, known for The Most Terrible Time in My Life (1993), Doctors: Saikyô no meii - 2015 Special (2015) and Good Partner: The Invincible Lawyer (2016).
biography.name: Masako Miyaji

biography.bio: Kenji Anan was born on February 24, 1962 in Oita, Japan. He is an actor and director, known for The Most Terrible Time in My Life (1993), Gokusen: The Movie (2009) and Akumu chan (2012).
biography.name: Kenji Anan

biography.bio: Zen Kajiwara was born on February 25, 1966 in Okayama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Welcome Back, Mr. McDonald (1997), Suite Dreams (2006) and The Most Terrible Time in My Life (1993).
biography.name: Zen Kajiwara
